Juwan Howard

Juwan Antonio Howard

(Nook)

Position: Power Forward, Small Forward, and Center ▪ Shoots: Right

6-9, 240lb (206cm, 108kg)

Born: February 7, 1973 in Chicago, Illinois us

Relatives: Cousin Jalen McDaniels; Son Jett Howard

College: Michigan

High School: Chicago Vocational Career Academy in Chicago, Illinois

Draft: Washington Bullets, 1st round (5th pick, 5th overall), 1994 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: November 19, 1994

Career Length: 19 years

  • 1x All Star
  • 2x NBA Champ
  • 1995-96 All-NBA
  • 1994-95 All-Rookie

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Juwan Howard?

Juwan Howard is 52 years old.

Where was Juwan Howard born?

Juwan Howard was born in Chicago, Illinois.

When was Juwan Howard born?

Juwan Howard was born on February 7, 1973.

How tall is Juwan Howard?

Juwan Howard is 6-9 (206 cm) tall.

How much did Juwan Howard weigh when playing?

Juwan Howard weighed 240 lbs (108 kg) when playing.

Is Juwan Howard in the Hall of Fame?

Juwan Howard is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Juwan Howard drafted?

Juwan Howard was drafted by Washington Bullets, 1st round (5th pick, 5th overall), 1994 NBA Draft.

What position did Juwan Howard play?

Power Forward, Small Forward, and Center.

When did Juwan Howard retire?

Juwan Howard last played in 2013.

What is Juwan Howard's net worth?

Juwan Howard made at least $151,465,633 playing professional basketball.

How much did Juwan Howard make?

Juwan Howard made $20,625,000 in 2003.

What did Juwan Howard average?

Juwan Howard averaged 13.4 points, 6.1 rebounds, and 2.2 assists per game.

How many rings does Juwan Howard have?

Juwan Howard won 2 championships.

What is Juwan Howard's Twitter account?

Juwan Howard is on Twitter at JuwanHoward.

What schools did Juwan Howard attend?

Juwan Howard attended Chicago Vocational Career Academy in Chicago, Illinois and Michigan.

What are Juwan Howard's nicknames?

Nook is a nickname for Juwan Howard.
